 External secrets environment variables

--8<-- "snippets/self-hosting/file-based-configuration.md"

You can use an external secrets store to manage credentials for n8n. Refer to External secrets for details.

| Variable | Type  | Default  | Description |
| :------- | :---- | :------- | :---------- |
| N8NEXTERNALSECRETSUPDATEINTERVAL | Number | 300 (5 minutes) | How often (in seconds) to check for secret updates. |
